document.full_text: an indian court ordered the former chief organizer of the delhi commonwealth games into police custody on tuesday, as police stepped up a crackdown on businesses and government officials in a string of corruption cases to hit the emerging global giant.
document.title: indian court sends ex-games chief into police custody
lines_and_colors: an indian court ordered the former chief organizer of the delhi commonwealth games into police custody on tuesday, as police stepped up a crackdown on businesses and government officials in a string of corruption cases to hit the emerging global giant.
